### ERROR TIPS

#### Placement Collisions (7 new instances)
- Clear existing entities before placing boilers (failed at -10.0,0.0 twice)
- Verify target position is clear using `get_entities_at()` before placement (failed at 17.5,75.5 for furnace)
- Check for obstructions before placing steam engines (failed at -7.5,2.0)
- Remove existing drills before placing new ones (failed at 15.5,70.5)

#### Fluid System Connection Issues (4 new instances)
- Ensure proper alignment of connection points when connecting pipes (failed at -6.0,1.5 to -4.5,6.5)
- Verify fluid system compatibility when connecting pipes
- Clear obstructions in pipe paths before connection attempts (failed at -7.0,1.5 to -2.5,6.5)
- Check connection directions for offshore pumps and boilers

#### Power Distribution Issues
- Verify power pole placement covers all electrical entities (multiple drills still without power)
- Check power network connectivity after placement

#### Existing Issues (from previous report)
- Clear backed-up transport belts (iron belt at 15.5,72.5)
- Fuel all furnaces and inserters (multiple entities out of fuel)
- Verify inserter pickup/drop positions (multiple instances waiting for source items)
- Maintain proper spacing when placing near existing entities

#### New Recommendations
- Implement systematic clearing of placement areas before building
- Develop standardized power plant blueprint with verified connections
- Create dedicated smelting arrays for plate production
- Establish monitoring system for power network coverage
- Implement connection verification checks before finalizing fluid systems
